text.tinkers_analyzer.editing_mode.title: Editing Mode
text.tinkers_analyzer.editing_mode.descr: Press %1$s to toggle editing mode, press %2$s to switch the selection
text.tinkers_analyzer.editing_mode.angle: Scroll to adjust the graph's angle (horizontal angle while sneaking)
text.tinkers_analyzer.editing_mode.dista: Scroll to adjust the graph's distance
